description: Reusable UI components providing date range selection functionality with predefined quick selectors and custom range support

components.DateRangePicker: Comprehensive date range picker StatefulWidget with quick selectors and custom range dialog support.

components._DateRangePickerState: State management for date selection, controller handling, and dialog presentation with validation logic.

rules: Configurable date range picker with optional quick selectors and custom width support.
DateTimeRange integration with proper start/end date validation and cross-date dependency handling.
Quick range presets: Today, Last 7/30/90 days with automatic date calculation and range setting.
Custom date range dialog with Material Design theming and primary blue color scheme.
Date format display: MM/dd/yyyy format for user-friendly date representation.
Text controller management with proper disposal and content updates during date selection.
Date validation logic: end date clearing when before start date, automatic start date setting.
Modal dialog presentation with StatefulBuilder for reactive content updates.
Date picker theming with app colors integration and consistent visual styling.
Display text generation: shows selected range or placeholder text based on current state.
Range clearing functionality with null callback and controller reset.
Input field styling with calendar icons, border radius, and proper padding.
Dialog layout: header with close button, quick selectors section, custom range inputs, action buttons.
Action button state management: Apply button disabled until valid range selected.
ValueChanged callback pattern for parent component communication with selected range.
InkWell tap handling with border radius for proper material ripple effects.
Container styling with background color, border, and consistent height (36px).
Responsive width handling through optional width parameter with flexible expansion.
Dialog width constraint (400px) with proper padding and content organization.
Quick selector button styling with outlined button design and proper spacing.
Error handling and edge cases: null safety, empty selections, and date boundary validation.
Integration with reports time range selector and other date-dependent features.
